skills.name: Weather (NWS)
skills.description: Flexible weather: summary for a day, when it will rain, sunrise/sunset, when above freezing again, or conditions at a specific time. Supports any US location by ZIP.

location.description: US location: 5-digit ZIP or text containing ZIP (e.g. '43130', 'Columbus 43130'). Omit to use BO_DEFAULT_ZIP.

intent.description: summary = day forecast; rain_timing = when will it rain; sunrise_sunset = when sun rises/sets; above_freezing = when temp > 32Â°F again; at_time = conditions at a specific time (use with time).

day.description: For summary: 'today', 'tomorrow', or weekday ('Thursday', 'Saturday'). Multiple days: comma or ' and ' (e.g. 'tomorrow,saturday' or 'tomorrow and saturday'). For at_time: 'today' or 'tomorrow'. All times use BO_DEFAULT_TZ (default America/New_York).

time.description: For intent at_time: time of day, e.g. '5pm', '17:00', '5 pm'.

date.description: For sunrise_sunset: date in YYYY-MM-DD. Omit for today.

skills.name: Google (Gmail & Calendar)
skills.description: Search and read Gmail; send emails; list, search, create, update, delete calendar events; check free/busy. Uses gog CLI (must be configured).

query.description: Natural language request: e.g. 'search my email for invoices', 'what's on my calendar tomorrow', 'send an email to X about Y', 'create a meeting with Bob at 3pm tomorrow'.

skills.name: Web Search (Brave)
skills.description: Search the web for facts, people, phone numbers, definitions, or anything. Uses Brave Search API (BRAVE_API_KEY).

query.description: Search query: e.g. 'Dominic Catanzaro phone number', 'weather in Paris', 'who won the 2024 election'.
